title: Man and woman arrested as CAB seize €220,000 of drugs, €80,000 in cash and designer goods
description: A MAN and a woman have been arrested after the Criminal Assets Bureau seized €220,000 worth of drugs, €80,000 in cash and a number of luxury watches.
content:
Members from the Criminal Assets Bureau also found designer handbags in the raid.
